page.title: 05SHOPS AND SERVICES
page.content: Eaglesfield still has two{shops,}one is the Post Office which also sells food and other household provisions. The other is a newsagent cum general store.Petrol can be bought at the village pump. Two plumbing/heating engineers are based in the village,and one typing/duplicating business. Several residents offer bed and breakfast{accomodation}and there are two haulage contractors,a sawmill, limestone quarry,dog boarding kennels and market garden The National{Health}Service doctor at Ecclefechan also has a surgery in Eaglesfield.A chiropodist and osteopath cum naturopath reside and practise in the area,also an undertaker. A Regional Council{Library}van visits once a week,but for banks,dentists and other shops one has to visit a town.
